title: Impact of contr monetary, exp fiscal policies

content.question: A contractionary monetary policy combined with an expansionary fiscal policy will

choices.label: have uncertain effects on the interest rate and investment
increase the interest rate and decrease investment
increase both the interest rate and investment

content.answer: increase the interest rate and decrease investment

topic.text: 5.1: Fiscal and Monetary Policy Actions in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
